# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #38](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#38)

#### Question

What's up with Szeth? (
*The Way of Kings*
)

#### Brandon Sanderson

He's very bound by his honor, but very messed up psychologically.
